title: Keeping DC'ing randomly from game.

replies.body:
Sounds like your network is probably having some connection routing issues when trying to reach our servers specifically. Those other games have different servers so it doesn't factor in much, but it does let me know your internet is running at the least. If you've been playing on wifi, I would definitely switch to an ethernet connection if at all possible to get a more stable link with our servers. 

If that's not helping too much, try adjusting your DNS settings to 8.8.8.8/8.8.4.4 as well, following the [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) if you aren't sure how to changes those.
